de.hsb.ms.syn.common.net

Class NetMessageFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.hsb.ms.syn.common.net.NetMessageFactory

  • public final class NetMessageFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is utilized to properly instantiate NetMessages to be sent over network. A direct call to new NetMessage() will result in an IllegalAccessException, alas it is necessary to use the create() method of this class.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      NetMessageFactory() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static NetMessage create(NetMessage.Command command, java.lang.Object... args)
      Create a NetMessage object with the given Command and the specified arguments.

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • NetMessageFactory

        public NetMessageFactory()

    • Method Detail

      • create

        public static NetMessage create(NetMessage.Command command,
                java.lang.Object... args)
        Create a NetMessage object with the given Command and the specified arguments. These arguments are listed below: Command HELLO: String - Name of the device Command CHANGEPARAM: int - The ID of the Node affected by the property change NodeProperty... - The adjusted NodeProperty objects (can be more than one) Command SENDNODES: HashMap - Map structure with ID-Properties relations Command METHOD: String - Method name Object... - Method arguments in correct order Command SENDID: int - The ID of the device's connection float[] - The RGB value of the Color for this device's highlights Command SELECTNODE: int - The ID of the Node to select Command BYE: int - The ID of the device that has disconnected
        Parameters:
        command - Command of the NetMessage
        args - Arguments needed to construct the NetMessage (see above)
        Returns:
        NetMessage object to send over network
